trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the routed events related to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager"></xref> classes, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 관련 된 라우트된 이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager"> </xref> 클래스, 예를 들어 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: 이 대리자는 다음 연결 된 이벤트와 함께 사용:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName>이 대리자는도 기본 요소의 다음 라우트된 이벤트와 함께 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward some of the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 일반 요소 모델에 쉽게 액세스할 수 있도록 앞에 나열 된 연결 된 이벤트 중 일부를 이러한 라우트된 이벤트의 전달 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName>연결 된 이벤트와 기본 요소의 라우트된 이벤트의 이벤트 데이터를 공유 하 고 버블링 터널링 라우트된 이벤트의 버전 및 이벤트 데이터를 공유할 수도 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewTextInput?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 이 경로 따라 이동할 때 이벤트의 처리 된 특성에 영향을 줄 수 있습니다.
